title: Space Week - Chabot Space & Science Center | Kids Out and About San Francisco
text:
Space Week - Chabot Space & Science Center
From the Bay Area to the stars—space exploration is happening now, and you’re invited to experience it up close at Space Week.
Join us for five epic days of hands-on activities, live demonstrations, inspiring talks, and interactive fun for all ages. Meet real NASA scientists, connect with Bay Area space innovators, and explore the bold ideas shaping tomorrow’s missions to the Moon, Mars, and beyond.
Whether you’re launching rockets, stargazing, or dancing to live music during our weekend festival—there’s something here for everyone.
Please help us keep this calendar up to date! If this activity is sold out, canceled, or otherwise needs alteration, email
mindy@kidsoutandabout.comso we can update it immediately. If you have a question about the activity itself, please contact the organization administrator listed below.
*Times, dates, and prices of any activity posted to our calendars are subject to change. Please be sure to click through directly to the organization’s website to verify.
